entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
